original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2211)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2211)@</color>以指定地點為中心，召喚一個太極陣，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2211)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2211)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2211)@</color> With the designated location as the center, summon a Tai Chi array with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2211)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> The enemy causes spell damage.
